belowBlobBottom.No_bar: because no blobs above bar charts!
because no blobs above bar charts!

belowPanelHeaderBaseline.NOTE: Padding BETWEEN panels is in panelAttributes node

fill.NOTE: If types are identical, set left/right; else set coloursets by type

brokenScaleFactors.note: x and y axes (tho no BS drawn on x-axis)

content.NOTE-1: paragraph is padding between lines; currently used for leading
content.NOTE-2: leading should be useful later, but as of Oct'20 is ignored

colours.NOTE: If types are identical, set left/right; else set types to a colourset

thermo.note: Visible width and height. If w < h, line is vertical

strings.meta: films template places the title and the subtitle centered in the chart, so its x position  should be the half of the size of background.outerbox.dimensions.width, and its text-align = middle

source.keepBottomMargin_NOTE: some presets (i.e. Films. want to keep the background margin bottom even when there is no source. In that case the preset comes with a keepBottom flag
source.keepBottomMarginOffset_NOTE: this is the value to increases graph area's height in order to grow until the baseline of the source, when the source is not present. It's basically the distance between the baseline of the axis x label and the source's baseline. If the flag keepBottomMargin is true and there is no source, the area chart grows to sit on the baseline of the source
